channel.title: GAN on Hey I'm Gagan!
channel.description: Recent content in GAN on Hey I'm Gagan!

item.title: Experimentation with StyleGAN2 - Projecting real image to artistic deep fake
item.description: Note to self: Don’t try to deep fake shades with old artistic paintings. You’ll end up getting dark circles. Another note to self: Tame your beard man! You are no longer in the olden ages! :P Overview of GAN - Generative Adversarial Network GANs as the name suggest are generative ML models used to generate artificial content. They’re popularly used to generate deep fakes, which are equivalent to real pictures. “Adversarial Networks” because under the hood they employ two deep neural networks.
